draw.shapes

Interface Shape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Group, Oval, PrimitiveShape, Rect

    public interface Shape
extends Cloneable
    Interface for shapes. Defines method to get and set position and size, to draw and fill the shape, test for selection and make a copy of the shape. Must be implemented by all shapes. All shapes implement Cloneable.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    hp
    See Also:
    Cloneable

    • Method Summary

      Makes a deep copy of this shape object.

      Draw this shape on Graphics g

      Gets the top border coordinate of this shape.
      int getWidth()
      Gets the width of this shape.

      Sets the position of this shape

      • isSelection

        boolean isSelection(int x,
                  int y)
        Determine if the x/y coordinate means a selection of this shape. Selection is done by clicking near the border of the shape.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if x/y means a selection of this shape, false otherwise

        Makes a deep copy of this shape object.
        Returns:
        the copy of this shape.
